This app establishes a direct connection to the actual Battlelog servers and logs in using your Origin-account. If you\'re interested in viewing the actual source, it\'s viewable on github via the following link: http://bit.ly/bf3blsrc
As the workflow of login process is identical to logging in using a regular web browser, one could say that it\'s as safe as your current network connection is.
Are you sure that you aren\'t stealing our passwords?

Yes, I'm 100% certain of that.

The only time that the app is sending your Origin credentials anywhere is when a) you login manually or b) the background service needs to re-login due to Battlelog logging you out.

In other words, your login information never gets sent to any third-party servers or similar, and they're encrypted locally so that no other application can steal the information with ease.
